summary: Motivated Full Stack Developer with 7 years of coding experience and over 2 years of combined industry experience in Full Stack Development, Solution Design and Data Analysis. Possesses strong problem-solving and technical skills, excelling in both independent and collaborative environments, with a commitment to continuous learning and growth. Seeking a role in an environment where my skills can be further developed while providing mutual benefit to the employer.

work-experience.summary: Design Solutions that solve problems for customers.
detail: Developed Python-based tools to replace Excel for data analysis. Used Pandas, Numpy, and Seaborn to streamline complex data processing, generated statistics and visualisations to present insights into the current network situation and identified possible site locations.

As a Solution Engineer, responsible for the solution design, requirement analysis and project coordination for the Dynamic Spectrum Sharing (DSS) feature to improve the network experience for customers in Thailand and Indonesia. I have aligned technical details and assessed solution feasibility with other Solution Engineers and leaderships, discussed and refined the design with the development team. The features all successfully went online.

work-experience.summary: Backend Web Developer worked in a team of 20, proficient in Java, Spring Boot, Maven and PostgreSQL, delivering web applications for industrial use.
detail: Worked in a team of 20, developed and maintained a web application to support network design and planning for Huawei, utilised microservices architecture with RESTful APIs to facilitate communication between services.
As a Backend Developer, proficiently used Java, Spring Boot, Maven, and PostgreSQL, with experience in Redis. Took on front-end development tasks, proficient in JavaScript, CSS and Vue.js.
Demonstrated strong proficiency in the Agile development lifecycle by effectively participating in scrum meetings, managing tasks, prioritising work, and ensuring timely delivery.
Strong team player, worked closely with Business Analysts, Test Engineers and Frontend Developers to align requirement and implementation details, ensuring efficient and timely project delivery.
Participated in architecture design, including requirement analysis, system design, and performance optimisation.

As a code committer in Huawei's internal Git platform, ensured all merged code adhered to best practices, and met security standards while giving helpful and constructive comments when edits were needed.

work-experience.summary: Support the learning of students during lectures and lab sessions.
detail: Provided timely support to students during weekly laboratory sessions and lectures for 2 Computer Science modules: Algorithms and Data Structures, and Logics and Discrete Structures.
Communicated effectively with professors and students to identify learning needs, enhanced the learning experience for beginners by developing supplementary materials.

education-experience.modules: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Information Visualisation, OOP, Computer Security
Software Engineering, Web Development, Database Systems, Graphical User Interface, Interaction Design

projects.name: Weather Forecasting Web App
projects.summary: A web app providing real-time weather forecasts based on user location.
detail: Used React to create dynamic UI components and fetch API data.
Integrated OpenWeatherMap API to display current and forecasted weather.
Styled the app with responsive design using CSS Flexbox and Grid.

projects.name: E-commerce Platform
projects.summary: An e-commerce website for selling electronics and gadgets.
detail: Developed a secure user authentication system with JWT.
Designed and implemented product catalog with search and filter features.
Deployed the platform using Docker and Nginx.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.summary: Personal portfolio website showcasing skills and projects.
detail: Used HTML and CSS to design a responsive portfolio layout.
Included dynamic elements using vanilla JavaScript.
Hosted the site on GitHub Pages.

projects.name: Task Management System
projects.summary: A task management app for organizing daily work and personal tasks.
detail: Implemented task creation, deletion, and updating features.
Integrated Firebase for real-time data syncing.
Used Material UI for clean and user-friendly design.
